description.value:
You move as fast and as high as the wind itself. You're permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Quickened]{Quickened}.

You can use your extra action to Stride or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap}, to provide one of the actions needed for a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.High Jump]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump}
